channel.title: DevilsScape
channel.description:
[SIZE=4]As some of you might know, I started from the bottom. From Cloudin 562/668, which was based off of the rs2hd framework. I have grown up a lot since then, messing around with booleans, adding new commands, creating npc drops, editing character files, creating player titles, making mini boss pets, adding in custom item models, cache editing, and eventually, making a fully fledged server with outstanding content. I do not like to brag, but I think I have grown myself as a developer since the year I have started programming. I have never taken any classes in java or any form of programming. Rather, I have looked at code, and learned from it. That is what I like to do, learn, and DevilsScape V1, DevilsScape V2, DevilsScape V3, and RuneElite (My old server) have taught me a lot, and I hope to continue learning more and more about java and other program protocol.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Enough with my blabbering, onto the server itself. I have started on DevilsScape V4 from a blank base: RuneEscape, something new from rs2hd and its bugs, and hope to make this big. Stability is better now and some things are no longer limited as they used to be.[/SIZE]
Revision: 562/666
Progress will be shown throughout the thread.
Credits: [MENTION=2179]dragonkk[/MENTION] [MENTION=92924]darkside1222[/MENTION] Me ( [MENTION=126686]milf hunter[/MENTION] )
[spoiler="Things Done by me"] [SIZE=5]Summoning New Dialogue System Projectile clipping User titles Chat effects fix Players online from report abuse button. Object Handler Item Handler NPC Handler Nex Corporeal Beast Jad Ball'ak XP Counter Money pouch Playing time Minigames Gambler Firemaking Cooking Mining Gilded Altar High/low level alchemy Super heating items Fishing Hunter Herblore Crafting Fletching Custom Items Item Examines NPC Examines Object Examines Quest system Perfected combat Hit soaking Dicing Flower game Location crystal Blink Achievement system Random event handler Sandwich lady random event Task System. Dropping Items Picking up Items Clan chat Torva effect
I will constantly update this throughout the development of this project.[/SIZE][/spoiler]
[spoiler="Pictures"] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3w8NC.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3w8PI.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3w8S0.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3w8VU.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3w90U.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3puzItl.png?1[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3w9fp.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
I hope to make this a more successful server than my previous ones.

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Damn, I like that location crystal a lot

Read full topic

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @Lucifer667 Lucifer667
item.description:
@Lucifer667 wrote:

Have a couple of updates. First off, the location crystal. It lets you save 3 locations of your choice and teleport there any time.

EawMW2v.png?1775×534

Second: A complete RuneScape-Like sandwich lady random event, and a random event handler.



anDWY6T.png?1781×534

Read full topic

item.title: DevilsScape
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

The teleport system is a cool concept and all, except it just is unorganized when you have a mixture of bosses, minigames, pking locations, and training locations all in one. You should make a separate menu for each.

Read full topic

@Lucifer667 wrote:

[SIZE=4]As some of you might know, I started from the bottom. From Cloudin 562/668, which was based off of the rs2hd framework. I have grown up a lot since then, messing around with booleans, adding new commands, creating npc drops, editing character files, creating player titles, making mini boss pets, adding in custom item models, cache editing, and eventually, making a fully fledged server with outstanding content. I do not like to brag, but I think I have grown myself as a developer since the year I have started programming. I have never taken any classes in java or any form of programming. Rather, I have looked at code, and learned from it. [SIZE=3]Enough with my blabbering, onto the server itself. I have started on DevilsScape V4 from a blank base: RuneEscape, something new from rs2hd and its bugs, and hope to make this big. Stability is better now and some things are no longer limited as they used to be.[/SIZE]
